short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Web Developer tool: Add, change or remove headers on your requests.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool will allow you Add, change or remove headers on your requests.

It can also warn you if there are errors in the page you are navigating. 
Useful since we don't keep DevTools always open.
